original_title: Rodney Yee's Yoga for Your Week
overview: Look good and feel great in just 20 minutes a day with Rodney Yee's Yoga for Your Week. Five different practices bring you five different benefits: focus, energy, flexibility, strength, and relaxation. Perfect for today's busy lifestyle. Find an extra 20 minutes in your day and you're on your way to a happier, healthier you.
tagline: Get Your Daily Dose of Yoga
title: Rodney Yee's Yoga for Your Week
